p: Isolated proteins from this frost-resistant plant (0.1, 1, and 10 µg/mL) have been used as an additive to cryopreserve Nili-Ravi buffalo sperm [ 81]. After semen thawing, samples treated with this plant (0.1 and 1 µg/mL) showed higher sperm progressive motility and plasma membrane integrity than the control group. None of the concentrations used were detrimental for sperm function.
